#### The published [paper](https://www.cell.com/current-biology/fulltext/S0960-9822(23)00071-4) is available on-line.

This paper assesses and compares the environmental footprint of farming industrial broiler chickens and farmed salmonids to identify opportunities to reduce environmental pressures. You can find an accompanying summary article in [The Conversation](https://theconversation.com/farmed-salmon-or-chicken-environmental-footprint-research-can-guide-eco-conscious-consumers-199773).
